meanings.definition: Similar in every detail; exactly alike.
meanings.sent1: The twins wore identical outfits to the party.
meanings.sent2: The two snowflakes were identical in shape and size.
meanings.sent3: It was funny how their identical hairstyles made them look like twins.
meanings.sent4: The two cars parked side by side were identical, like mirror images.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces fit together perfectly, identical in every way.

meanings.definition: Being the same in every way.
meanings.sent1: The two boxes were identical in weight and size.
meanings.sent2: Their handwriting was so identical that it was hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing how their identical taste in music led to constant arguments.
meanings.sent4: The two paths through the forest seemed identical, making it hard to choose.
meanings.sent5: The two paintings were identical, down to the smallest brushstroke.

meanings.definition: Having such close resemblance as to be essentially the same.
meanings.sent1: The two breeds of dogs were almost identical in appearance.
meanings.sent2: Their voices were so identical that even their parents had trouble telling them apart.
meanings.sent3: It was a funny coincidence how their tastes were almost identical.
meanings.sent4: The two keys looked identical, but only one could open the treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: The two houses on the street were identical, making it hard to find the right one.
